sentences.sentence: The value of America keep stable between 2010 and 2015; while Japan, Britain and China decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.

sentences.sentence: The value of America keep stable between 2010 and 2015; while Japan, Britain and China decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.
